name: Connectifier
overview:
After being in leadership at Google and noting how key recruiting was to the success of teams there, the Connectifier team left to build a product to help recruiting work better for everyone.

Every month millions of jobs are left unfilled. This means people look for work longer, companies move slower, and products and services that we all want don’t get delivered. Recruiting costs $400 billion per year and there’s ample room to make it better. Connectifier is committed to getting people in jobs faster, and driving the economy forward.
